Designed for clean, safe, and great-tasting water - perfectly suited to Ontario homes.

settings.saving-text: Why Homeowners Choose Go Lime for Water Filters

I called Saturday afternoon, confirmed online Saturday night, and the work was completed Sunday afternoon. I have been so impressed with the service from my phone conversation with Juan to the installation by Alireza. Now I can only hope that the product is as good as the price, technicians, and customer service.

Finally, purchased today, scheduled installation over the weekend. For comparison I have checked with Home Depot and they quoted $2200 +tax. Rheeem 50 Gallon power vent $1489 is the item they will install, so roughly $700 installation fees. They won’t return the old one. Not sure about Costco pricing, they have $300 Gift Card. I don’t think anyone else would sell less than Go Lime. Thanks.

I just had Go Lime install my new hot water tank, and everything went great. No issues at all, and you can't beat the price. Some people complained about the fan on the hot water tank being super loud, but I don’t have that issue at all. In fact, it’s quieter than my old tank

This is the third time I met Ashraf to do the services at my home, everytime the next experience waa wonderful than the previous one, he is extremely knowledgeable and imparts wonderful professionalism. He not only fixed the issues but gave me the tips & advices how to maintain and keep running the systems. He is very courteous, friendly and helpful, I will definitely will recommend him100% for the jobs and want to see him if I have the service calls.

settings.intro-text: Repairs Happen. Go Protect Keeps You Covered.
settings.intro-desp: Protect your product with coverage that ensures peace of mind. Go Protect has got you covered for repairs or replacements, so you can focus on what matters.

settings.intro-text-1: Flex Your Budget With Go Flex
settings.intro-desp-1: Enjoy comfort on your terms with Go Flex- our flexible payment option that lets you spread out the cost of your equipment and service. No large upfront payments, no surprises, just predictable monthly plans that work with your budget.

settings.plant-desp: Every order supports reforestation. For each purchase made, we plant a tree because real change starts with simple actions. Place an order, and we’ll plant a tree on your behalf.

settings.pd-heading: Does my monthly price ever go up?
settings.pd-desp: Our pricing isn’t a flashy promotional rate - it’s fair and transparent from the start. Over time, there may be minor adjustments to ensure you continue receiving top-notch service. But don’t worry - we’re talking about just a dollar or two per year at most. No surprises, just straightforward savings. Plus, you can purchase the equipment at any time, giving you ultimate savings and flexibility.

Moving? No problem. Our Go Flex plan is fully transferable to the next homeowner, allowing them to seamlessly pick up where you left off. Just let us know 30 days before your move, and we’ll handle the rest. We’re here to make your move hassle-free, just the way it should be.

settings.pd-heading: What is the warranty with my purchase?
settings.pd-desp: With the Go Flex Program, you’re 100% covered—24/7/365—for both parts and labour, including annual maintenance. If you choose to purchase the equipment, you’ll receive the standard manufacturer’s warranty. Start with the Go Flex Program to enjoy all the benefits we offer, and when you’re ready, you can purchase the equipment at your convenience.

settings.pd-heading: How long have you been in business?
settings.pd-desp: Go Lime has been keeping homes comfortable since 2011. With over 150,000 customers across Ontario, we’ve spent more than a decade earning the trust of homeowners just like you. Partnering with trusted names like Enbridge, Home Depot, and Walmart, you can count on the Go Lime team to take care of your family.

settings.pd-heading: Is Go Flex a rental, and what is the term?
settings.pd-desp: Go Flex isn’t a never-ending rental contract. It’s a game-changer: an industry-first flexible 180-month subscription with an anytime purchase option. Here’s how it works: 50% of your monthly payment reduces your purchase price, while the other 50% covers 24/7 service, annual maintenance, and unlimited parts and labour coverage. You get all the perks of ownership without the headaches—and the flexibility to purchase the equipment at any time.

settings.pd-heading: What’s the difference between a water filter and a water softener?
settings.pd-desp: A water filter removes contaminants like chlorine, sediment, bacteria, and heavy metals from your water supply. A water softener, on the other hand, removes minerals like calcium and magnesium that cause hardness. While filters improve water quality and taste, softeners prevent scale buildup in pipes and appliances.

settings.pd-heading: How do I know if I need a water softener?
settings.pd-desp: If you notice white spots on dishes, soap not lathering well, or buildup on faucets and showerheads, you likely have hard water.

settings.pd-heading: What are the benefits of installing a water softener?
settings.pd-desp: Water softeners help extend the life of your plumbing, improve water heater efficiency, reduce soap and detergent usage, and leave your skin and hair feeling softer after showers.

settings.pd-heading: Do water softeners remove harmful contaminants?
settings.pd-desp: No, softeners only target hardness minerals. If you're concerned about chlorine, lead, bacteria, or other contaminants, you’ll need a filtration system. In many homes, a softener and whole-house filter are installed together for complete protection.

settings.pd-heading: Do water filters or softeners require maintenance?
settings.pd-desp: Yes, both systems require regular care. Filters should be replaced according to the manufacturer's guidelines typically every 3 to 12 months. Softeners need salt refills and occasional cleaning of the brine tank.

settings.pd-heading: Can I install a water softener or filter myself?
settings.pd-desp: While some systems are DIY-friendly, professional installation ensures proper setup, especially for whole-home systems that connect to your main water line. We offer expert installation to ensure long-term performance and warranty protection.

settings.pd-heading: Can I use both a filter and softener together?
settings.pd-desp: Absolutely. In fact, combining both gives you complete protection - soft, scale-free water plus clean, filtered water for drinking, cooking, and bathing. Many homeowners install both for full home water treatment.
